website_summaries.verdict: A sound option for modern decor. It's not as durable as the Chandler, but it's the best value for your money.
pros: Laminate-like top and chrome frame offer a chic, contemporary feel
cons: The finish has a tendency to scratch easily
The top is hollow and not as durable as other models on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love my table it does well with my living room. Everything was well packed and it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and style of this table, it's super chic and cute. It came a little chipped and scuffed on one of the ends which really is minor to everyone but I'm a little bit of a perfectionist, so my eye is always drawn to. But non the less I love this table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged. Need replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee table and side table, but unfortunately it came damaged. Still waiting on a response from the seller about getting replacement parts. I'm really hoping they respond because the table itself has a great clean, modern look, and it'd be a shame to have to return it or throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoko

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Easy to assemble and had no damage as others reported.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love my table
customer_reviews.text: Love my table. Love the gloss white top. Very easy to assemble. I had no shipping problems. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Silvera

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful coffee table, and I've seen practically the same one elsewhere for more than double the price. Ordered a different one in a similar style to this and returned it in exchange for this one - the quality of this one is leaps ahead of the other. The metal on this isn't spray painted, for one, and is far more sturdy. Super easy to put together and makes my living room look like it belongs in a magazine. Edit- docking a star because the table top is already scratching and showing the laminate board, making it look pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. This table came packaged great. No damage or issues. So easy to put together. Honestly took about 5 min. Shocked how good it looks, because of the price. I honestly love it more than tables I looked at for 100s of dollars. Dust and dog hair does not show on this at all. Have had it for a while and it's just perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: CMiles1985

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, but not great. Looks: Don't expect high end stuff or quality. I read the size, but didn't visualize it I guess. After it was put together it looked tiny. Rug in pic is 6x9. Maybe because we always had large, solid wood coffee tables with storage. Also, because it is light, it slides on the carpet, a lot! It's a cute, smallish, modern table. Quality: See the pictures. Scratches and bent metal. Honestly, its a great, small, cheap coffee table. Perfect for a small couch, but not great if u have a sectional. Not sure if it will stain, but I'm sure we'll find out soon enough. Instructions don't really match the product, but you'll get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I went with this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I went with this coffee table! Beautiful in person, doesnt look cheap, well made, easy to assemble and adds a nice soft touch to the room
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ONLY REVIEW YOU NEED TO READ!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER post reviews but this is an exception. When I first opened the huge package, I thought it'd be hard to assemble. BUT it's NOT!!! Only a few bolts and a given tool, you're done. I finished setting up in 30 minutes and all you have to do is screw on the bolts with the tool they give you. Finishing product... VERY STURDY! I'm using this table to film so if it's sturdy enough to film, it will be sturdy enough for everyday use. Also, love the finishing gloss on it. The gloss sets this table higher than its competitors. LOVE!!!! Will be adding picture soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Lines and Modern Look
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived! The box was beat up and I was worried that it would be damaged but thankfully it was not. Assembly was fairly easy except for a couple of screws. Total assembly time was less than 20 minutes with 2 people. I love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Torres

customer_reviews.title: GLOSS BOSS
customer_reviews.text: Nice glossy table. If you are concerned it is going to be small it is not. It is a regular size coffee table. Tip: when assembling, lay something under the top like a blanket or towel. That will ensure you don't scratch the top (you flip the top over to attach the bottom.) Do not expect carpet NOT to scratch the top. Putting it together took 10 min. It's very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Coffee tables and all 8 corners are damaged like the pictures and manufacturer said "Shipping problem". Never. 2 boxes were delivered via UPS at the good condition. I never see any damage on the shipping boxes. Manufacturer did not accept the quality problem, because of that I am writing this review. Normally, I never leave negative feedback/review.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kamanli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a (one) big rectangular box. It’s heavy about 40 pounds. The instructions was just two images in one page with no steps or words at all. Just two pictures so pay close attention where the screw holes are located. Other than that, I love the table! It gives it a very elegant look. It’s shiny like marble and you can’t beat this price. I added images of how it looks like. Btw, all the pillows you see in my picture were bought in amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Glossy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table. It is heavier than I expected it to be. I had it assembled in under ten minutes without reading the directions. This may be common sense but for those of us unused to having to assemble things here’s a good tip: In order to get all the screws lined up correctly do not tighten anything until they are all in! I learned this the hard way after having one screw refuse to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Strickland

customer_reviews.title: But that's not to say I still don't enjoy the table
customer_reviews.text: It's made of composite wood so 99% chance it's going to have a slight mashed corner upon arrival, as did mine. But that's not to say I still don't enjoy the table. Very sturdy and easy to put together. Don't fall for the 4 hour put together time. It's serious about 40 min ,even while drinking.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Corner damaged, customer service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Prior to assembly, I noticed the corner of this table was damaged. According to the assembly instructions I should contact the company directly for faster customer service but I am sad to say that I've left multiple messages over the phone, through email and even attempted to contact them through amazon to maybe work out what do but I've been unable to get in contact with anyone. The table is sturdy enough and aesthetically pleasing, but times are hard and I'd like to get my money's worth and its not happening here. Would not purchase from this company again since their customer service is so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Loiiloii

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great design but the product came with two defects. The first is the table itself. Picture shows the uneven side. QC should have caught this. The second is the spot where two pieces meet together. On 3 sides they meet, but one side there is an 1/8 of an inch gap. I know amazon has an amazing return policy, but honestly who want to take apart a table and repack it, so I'll just keep and live with the flaws (of my OCD let's me 😂) Just realize that the price is great but the product may have some flaws.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: They put the price back down so I purchased this. It is an absolutely gorgeous table. I need something like a rug to fluff up the look but overall very well made and sturdy. I am a clutz and I havent managed to hurt the table so thats a good sign. It's a little shorter than I would like, Ill be attaching feet to the bottom but overall a fantastic table and for an amaaing price!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This table looks great and was very easy to assembly. Probably took me about twenty minutes from opening the package to having the table set up. The only tool needed to assemble the table is a hex key which was conveniently included in the box. The only imperfection was a slight scuff mark on one of the table's edges. Other than that, I have no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: BELLY

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: First impression on the table top is it’s great quality for the price, has weight to it and the glossy top looks so nice. Metal frame came is also sturdy and setting it up is so easy! You don’t even need the instructions to get it together. Overall I would recommend it. Definitely looks a lot more expensive than its listed as.
customer_reviews.author: 2DaysOrYoure2Late

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality sturdy classy looking table. When we first received the table part of the leg was welded crooked so it couldn’t be assembled but I called the company customer service and a human answered immediately and they were friendly and sent a replacement fast. The new part came and we assembling less than 10 minutes and the table looks great and is very strong and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: The table makes the room beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It makes the room classy. It looks expensive and the white with gloss along with chrome legs, you can't go wrong. The first delivery the box was in poor condition and we discovered the table was damaged, requested a tabletop replacement and it was delivered in a few days. Unfortunately that box was also damaged the table was now scratched. Requested a replacement no problem 3rd table top arrived the box in good condition table perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arelis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is fashionable and sturdy. It has some weight to it, but not too heavy as one person can easily lift it. I store cushions underneath the table because there is plenty of space. The white top has a sheen to it, which is due to a vinyl coating. For under $100, I would recommend this table, especially for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseblue

customer_reviews.title: Do not sleep on these!!! Get them now!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Do not sleep on this table because you wont be disappointed!! Really easy to put together, i did it alone and im 5'2 and 125lbs! Seems to be very sturdy. I did purchase one and it looked really pretty by itself but I wanted something bigger so I bought a second one to make it a large Square table! It's absolutely beautiful and everyone compliments me on it, they can't believe how much each table cost! By the way, I purchased one new table and when you stable, both were in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: daniella

customer_reviews.title: this is the best coffee table I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is the best coffee table I have ever owned. I will buy this table again and again forever. Because it’s chrome, the bottom looks see through and looks like it’s flowting on air. The white top is shiny and glossy and clean. I love this table. Looks good if you want a minimalist modern design. No more clunky wooden tables. This is the one! Very easy to put together. I’m a girl and I did it by myself! Girl power! Get this you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Q.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely table
customer_reviews.text: This table is lovely. It’s much heavier than I expected and seems very sturdy. I had no trouble assembling it and I am 74 years old. It took approximately 35 minutes. It comes packaged very well. There was no damage at all. I recommend this to anyone looking for an attractive, large, inexpensive and sturdy coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee table. I've read lots of review where the boxes come beat up and corners of the tables damaged. Our box came a little damaged and the corner of our table has the slightest of markings on it, but not enough to balk at. It's a sturdy table and really compliments our living room style. I'd order again, or even find the matching side tables.
customer_reviews.author: Amerika

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee table! As others have said it looks really expensive. For me it's easy to keep clean and I have a 7 year old. I can see how it would be easy to scratch though if you're not careful because it's essentially particle board painted with a glossy white coat. I'm not sure how long it will last but the good news is it's so affordable I can (and will!) just buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all the previous reviews I did not have to think twice to order this table when it went on sale. It came in a perfect condition and we love it! It brightens up our living room and is a starting point for further decorating. Easy assembly, took me (female in my 20's) about 40 mins to put it together. Very well worth the price. Thank you for a great deal, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: 8lackberry

customer_reviews.title: but I’m sooo happy I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous on this product cause I would always have wood furniture, but I’m sooo happy I purchased this!! It’s so beautiful I get compliments on it every time someone new comes in my house. There were no damages to it and putting it together was easy, it probably took us like 15 mins. I definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Received the order two days early. Wasn’t sure what to expect when I noticed the box was very damaged. After opening it up and saw all was good, took about 20 minutes to put it together even though the instructions could’ve be better - which way is up, this isn’t to scale, drawing doesn’t match. I love the look and style which is why I bought it and the entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, this table. This was a awesome buy. It gives my living room the luxurious feel I was going for. super easy to put together. I came packaged nice and tight.. no scraps or damages. I had company over and It received tons of compliments. Im looking for a dinning room table that resembles this coffee table. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was very easy to assemble took me about 20 mins or so to do. Came with everything needed to put it together so no use for extra tools. It’s very sturdy. Looks like it’s a $200 coffee table for a fraction of the price. Shipping was super fast and came a day earlier than expected. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to order this table for almost a month. I read the reviews and it concerned me but I couldn't pass up a good deal. Plus I really needed a coffee table. So I decided to take the chance and purchased it and glad I did. The table came really fast and in perfect condition I even put it together on my own. It goes really well with my modern furniture, I will order the nesting tables to match in a few days. I highly recommend the table to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality - very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low quality product. The frame is very wobbly, and squeaks. I've triple checked the screws in hopes of being able to tighten this up more to reduce the wobbly-ness of it, but everything is as tight as possible. It's as if the frame does not fit properly into itself (some pieces slide into other pieces). The positive, I suppose, was that it was not very difficult to set up, and only took about 20 minutes. However, would never buy another product from this retailer, as the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: JPayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my living room!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality coffee table!! Super easy to assemble, it comes with everything you need! It is the perfect accent to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks so elegant
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this -is- easy to assemble if you're actually paying attention to the directions and what you're doing. Unfortunately I was distracted by Parks & Rec and had to disassemble the entire thing and reassemble twice. But now that's it's all set up, it looks gorgeous, it's not too big nor too small. I get tons of compliments from my guests!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee table about 2 yrs now. It still looks great on my living room. I'm a pettie woman and it was easy to assemble by myself. As time goes by, the white side of corner starts peeling off , each time I gotta fix it with the glue. The quality is just fine. It's worth the money that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: santanee

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This very reasonably priced coffee table was totally worth it. Pure glossy white & very light weight. Easy to assemble , would purchase it again! In fact we bought the matching side tables.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Mines damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the table but I'm not happy that it's damaged and I can't return it because it doesn't fit in my car to take it to the ups store
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY !!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE !! Metal pieces came with some dark black “rust” on them which makes the piece look like it was used and not brand new, also DID NOT come with instructions I had to look at the pictures and figure it out how to put together. Worst money I’ve ever spent the only reason I edit. Return is because I totally ruined the box while opening.
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable modern dining table
customer_reviews.text: The is a very affordable modern coffee table. I get several compliments; however, it is very cheaply made. The high gloss white coating chips easily. If you have children or use your coffee table a lot I would not recommend purchasing. If you use you coffee table minimally (e.g, just for setting cups or books down) this is a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Eddine Luma

customer_reviews.title: super easy to put together but i recommend having two ...
customer_reviews.text: this just came in a week ago. came in four days i think. super easy to put together but i recommend having two people. took my boyfriend and i maybe 15 minutes. it looks SO classy and expensive. just like the pictures. if i saw this in someone's home i would easily believe they paid several hundred dollars for it. love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aderer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table after parts replacement
customer_reviews.text: The table is great, and exactly as advertised, but the company is really what earned my business! We received this table with a chip in the table top. I contacted Monarch Specialties the day after regarding this, and they sent a replacement part that i received 2 business days later, at no charge! I am so impressed with the quick customer service they provided, and I'll be buying more furniture from them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great in room
customer_reviews.text: Table is perfect for what we needed it for. Was super easy to assemble, no issues. Nothing was damaged and it looks expensive. We have been using coasters to avoid any potential scratches but so far no problems. Very happy with it and the size is great.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Good Size and Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Took me onky about 20 minutes to put together. Super simple construction. Expected the metal to be a bit better quality but it still looks great! Good sized and sturdy. I used contact paper to make my white surface look like marble and I'm ecstatic about the results!!! Definitely recommend this table to anyone who likes to personalize stuff. The white surface is a great starting point for a great coffee table makeover. It's also nice on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the top
customer_reviews.text: Giving three stars because the instructions are really bad. They are only 2 pictures. But I eventually figured it out. Really pretty table. Plan on ordering the end tables to match
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful coffee table for great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee table! It was delivered so fast, and was a breeze to put together! I’m 8 months pregnant and was able to do it myself in under thirty minutes. The tone of the wood color top is perfect. It seems pretty sturdy, my kids have been climbing all over it with no issues haha. It’s the perfect coffee table for our room and I get so many compliments on it. Great customer service from the company too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: beautiful coffee table and it's going to look beautiful in ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely gorgeous. Only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because the white top came damaged, one of the corners is smashed. Not the sellers fault technically just wasn't padded enough at the corners and the shipping men were too rough. I'm unsure if I'm able to contact the seller for a new top or if that would be a hassle.... Either way, beautiful coffee table and it's going to look beautiful in my beauty room.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Thankful I went with my gut and got this table!
customer_reviews.text: It completes my chic but practical look. I put a light gray fur rug under it and have yet to decide on a centerpeice, yet it still looks like a complete living room set. Im so happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Very Chic!
customer_reviews.text: Looks waaaay better in person! I wasn't sure if I should get it but I'm glad I did! Its sooo easy to put together! It matched well with the two side tables I bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Deicy

customer_reviews.title: I was actually surprised because its beautiful and I get compliments on it whenever I have ...
customer_reviews.text: So when I ordered this coffee table I really wasn't expecting much for the price. I was actually surprised because its beautiful and I get compliments on it whenever I have new visitors to my apartment. It fits perfectly in my space and the glossy top is really easy to clean. The package arrived and there were zero damages and it only took about ten minutes to assemble by myself. Overall its a classy table and looks like you have spent a lot more on it than you actually have!
customer_reviews.author: Kezzwithak

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to assemble, but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to assemble, but go slowly and follow the directions they give you and it’s ok. Product is just as depicted online and so beautiful in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca/Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build even by yourself and a beautiful edition to my living room! I moved into my first apartment that I would be living in alone so I didn't have a big budget as I had to furnish an entire apartment by myself. Just what I needed and what for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this table! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coffee table. I was sketched out at first but ones it arrived and we assembled it was a pleasant surprise to see how great it looks. It feels like quality material and does not feel cheap or wonky. I love this table and super happy about the quality. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Stoneking

customer_reviews.title: Monarch White and Silver Couch Table
customer_reviews.text: They need to be clear that the rails must be situated properly for the table top. Or you have to take it all apart again and start over. I had one screw left and found out the hard way. But it only took a half hour to assemble. For $99.00 you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE SCHACKLE

customer_reviews.title: Just bad.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was going to come with some kind of defect. You typically expect it with stuff this cheap, but damn. There must be 0 quality control because this thing was jacked up. Table top had a massive dent in it, and the packaging was fine. Which tells me it happened before it was even shipped. Rails weren't even, welds were ugly and sharp (they left weld slag all over the place). Skip this one. Pay a little more and get something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous table!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I didn’t even read instructions. My friends think that I spent tons more than what I purchased it for. I absolutely love this table.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves

customer_reviews.title: I could sleep under this
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very sure why, but they send with it 9 water cups. The table is huge so you would expect those whater cups to be in the regular size, but here is the thing, they are very small actually!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: So nice and classy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee table. So classy and beautiful. Fits so well with out sitting room. It’s very heavy also and just so durable. I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Temz

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! Very elegant and pretty! Easy to assemble and study! I believed with proper care it's going to last me for a very long long time! I'm in love with this coffee table! I believed it will fit in every living room!😊
customer_reviews.author: Jenneline B.

customer_reviews.title: Minor defects, easy to assemble, modern look!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, gives modern look to your furniture. Came with 2 minor defects. I don’t believe so were due to shipment as the table shiped in a gd package. Therefore, I believe the manufacturer quality people are closing one eye on such defects. My rating is based on these defects as I am expecting defects free product, and I saw several customers have the same issue; therfore, it is a continuous issue the company has to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Saif

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: very "que cute" but chrome base feels very fragile and welded together with only tack welds. The top shows very little peeling already right out of the box, so I expect it to be worthless soon. It doesn't bother me too much because I plan on making my own top... eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table! I actually saw this on wayfair first & then noticed it was much cheaper on amazon! It was super easy to put together, I did it myself in less than 30 minutes. It looks great & is very sturdy! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aerica

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Baby - Nic from My Beautiful Amazon House
customer_reviews.text: Check out the video clip. Short, sweet, to the point. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nic@MyBeautifulAmazonHouse

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and super easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and super easy to assemble. Feels like great quality too. The top is nice and heavy and so far so good with no scratches or issues.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: So chic and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this coffee table! I've never written an Amazon review before but just had to. I'm trying to decorate my new apartment on a budget and was worried about the quality of this table because of the price, but was so pleasantly surprised! Very sturdy, glossy clean-looking finish on the top, and very chic. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Cathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Modern
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Looks great in our family room. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Living room staple!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful modern coffee table for your living room area. Installed by myself and took about 30 mins. HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Holmes

customer_reviews.title: seriously?
customer_reviews.text: the item is wrong and severely damaged. going through an awful lot of hassle to get this sent back and will NOT buy another from here. I can run the risk of another damaged or wrong item. This is ridiculous. ordered a glossy white... got black and dark wood...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It has a couple of small scuffs on the chrome, but unless you are laying on the floor and looking very close you don't see them. Easy to put together, took me 20 minutes in my Pj's before I had my morning coffee :-). Looks absolutely fabulous. My 15yr old son (6' 200lbs.) sat on it gently to test it out, and all was fine....NOT RECOMMENDED TO SIT ON, but curious on how much weight it could hold. It's easy to clean and did I mention looks absolutely fabulous :-) :-)
customer_reviews.author: Melina B.

customer_reviews.title: Always comes damaged
customer_reviews.text: Table looks nice but packaging is careless and like most other reviews always comes damaged. Which mean you purchase a new box to get it shipped back because original packaging is damaged. Waste of time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tirell B

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great price for great product. Came as expected looks great in my living room . Number of friends ordered it as well after they saw it. Take a look!!
customer_reviews.author: Shlomi from New York

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table!! It's so simple and elegant and goes in my living room perfectly! Was so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kika Kaha'i

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This table was the perfect addition to my home. Once I took a second to really think about the pictures (no words with instructions) the table was super easy to put together. Only took about 15 mins. It has a good amount of surface area so you can place a decorative tray on it and still have plenty of room on it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D. Sands

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I felt silly for spending so much on a coffee table. But the design and the aesthetics (I bought the white and silver version) are a slam dunk. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Cool, modern and sturdy table. Easy to put together and great value for money. Have it now for about two years and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: stevo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee table!! The price was great and it was very easy to assemble. It is great quality and we are so happy we ordered it. Our dog loves it too because she can lay under it. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christie1216

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! Along with a table tray & small potted plant, it definitely added the pop of brightness to my living room. I love it. Economical and classy
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike about this coffee table.Easy to assemble matches my other pieces and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not even done decorating my livingroom and this already gives it a nice touch. Love the table, is glossy, classy, sturdy, easy to assemble. I recommended to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Flaca

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I saw it at a doctor's office and had to have one like it. The price is on point! It was easy to assemble and easy to clean. It's perfect for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: AmiW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful affordable coffee table....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee table. Its very contemporary and sophisticated looking, and after 2 moves is still in great condition! 2 energetic kids and 3 dogs later....this thing still looks practically new.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hartsfield

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Packed very well. Super easy to assemble. Looks much more expensive than it is it is a great accent to my den.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Top surface scratches :(
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product however my surface came scratched. Every day I see it now and think I should’ve bought a different coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: NicsDesign

customer_reviews.title: Could support my 65 inch tv (temporarily)
customer_reviews.text: I received this before i got my tv stand and used it for my 65 inch for about a week and it held up! This thing is surprisingly sturdy. It is also a pretty great coffee table now lol
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sleek and beautiful and i love the fiberglass looks like a mirror but in white if that makes sense lol
customer_reviews.author: JesusmySaviour

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This table was so easy to assemble. It arrived with no damage. I love the modern design. The white table to is beautiful. Compliments my decor nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mogul.Maven.🖤

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review: Great product but easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: Used this table for 2 years. Good value for money but the glossy top got scratched in a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great table! I needed a coffee table and this was perfect. Perfect size and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Trimble

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this table...easy to put together. One screw was difficult but otherwise overall beautiful table.. gloss is pretty and modern..table had two small scratches but can’t really notice.. looks fancy yet simple.. worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table! Looks just like the picture too. It adds a great aesthetic to the room, we love it! Very spacious too, gives a lot of space for toppers and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Sleek table! I’m a happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was easy to put together and looks sleek and expensive for the price. The only thing is, the top gets pretty dirty, and you can see it very easily. I am constantly wiping it down. That’s the only downside but other than that I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great coffee table, easy to put together, doesn't take long at all. The white top while pretty attracts dusts horribly though and does scratch/stain easier than I'd like to to (hence the 4 star review). I have to clean it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Chic Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table. I love it! It gives my new living room a modern vibe. Easy to assemble and an overall chic appearance. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Inmyowndream

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price! Easy to assemble! Very unique and modern! LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: casual luxe at it's finest!
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple classic coffee table with versatility for a myriad of styles. I just moved into this apartment and the couch table and lamp were my first purchases and are well on the way to creating my living room nirvana! Easy on time shipping - my partner put it together fairly easily ..
customer_reviews.author: Naila Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table. It’s nice and sturdy and went great with my decor
customer_reviews.author: Real Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Buy !
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. The same on was on Wayfair for more and i found this here ! Easy to assemble to me and I’ve never put anything together in my Life lol
customer_reviews.author: Ny’zira

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties Modern Coffee Table for Living Room Center Table with Metal Frame, 44 Inch L, Glossy White / Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:White / Chrome| Pattern Name:Coffee TableWith a glossy white surface and a stylish thick paneled design this cocktail table gives an exceptional look to any room. The modern rectangular shape and criss-cross chrome metal base provides sturdy support. Use this multi-functional coffee table to compliment your living room, family room, den or office space.
feature_bullets: Modern coffee table that fits perfectly in a living room, den, office room, and family room
Sturdy chrome criss-cross base that provides great support
Thick rectangle top that is quick and easy to clean
Abundant surface area in a glossy white finish
